Class Player

java.lang.Object
model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArtificialPlayer, RealPlayer
public abstract class Player extends Object implements Serializable
Author:
Luca Micarelli this abstract class represents a generic player
